node.statement: ACTION ON BLOCKS: By Lemma 2, the induced homomorphism φ: H_6 → Sym(B₀) ≅ S_3 satisfies Im(φ) = S_3. This shows H_6 acts transitively on the 3 blocks, with |Im(φ)| = |S_3| = 6. The map φ sends each element g ∈ H_6 to the permutation of blocks induced by g's action on the block labels.
